summary: Backend testing completed for CRM corrections. All 4 requested corrections are working correctly: 1) last_record_date shows date of last record (null if no records), 2) New Opportunity creates linked records with previous_record_id, 3) Search works by name and phone, 4) Multiple co-signers allowed per buyer. Admin login with xadmin/Cali2020 works correctly.
passed_tests: Last record date is null when client has no records
Last record date shows date of last record when records exist
Search by first name works correctly
Search by last name works correctly
Search by phone number works correctly
New Opportunity creates record with previous_record_id link
Multiple co-signers can be added to same buyer
Co-signer relations are properly stored and retrieved
User record creation with checklist fields
